alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:23PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CUSTER COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM MDT... At 523 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Custer State Park, or 10 miles east of Custer, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Northeastern Custer State Park around 530 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
